item.title: Part of children’s slide loose, 13th September
item.description:
A top part of children’s slide in Abbey Wood playground area is loose. It could drop in gust and put public in danger.

item.title: Chemicals outside pub, 13th September
item.description:
I would like to report a chemical spillage outside the pub The Joiner on Worship (been like this for over 3 days). The liquid has pooled along the curb (see attached photos) and poses a health and safety risk to staff, customers and the public.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Paul Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on pergola, 13th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Edith Nesbit Walk, Well Hall, London

item.title: At the junction of Anerley Park and Anerley Park Rd, 13th September
item.description:
Roadworks. Temporary traffic lights and subsequent bus delays and traffic accumulating...Drivers often blaring loud music in the early hours and late at night. Otherwise, drivers often beeping excessively and getting aggressive with each other, swearing and shouting again at all hours.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anerley Park, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet
